html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08362024-06-21TBS, TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the deputy head or a chief executive officer of a department to transfer public property in the form of nominal non-monetary gifts to a First Nations, Inuit or Métis recipient.
PrecisOrder Authorizing the deputy head or a chief executive officer of a department to transfer public property in the form of nominal non-monetary GIFTS to a FIRST NATION, INUIT OR MÉTIS RECIPIENT, as that term is defined in the Treasury Board’s Directive of Payments, who is involved in a collaborative ceremony, event or activity in which the Government of Canada takes part, to recognize or to honour the collaborative efforts made by that recipient’s community.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order Authorizing the deputy head or a chief executive officer of a department to transfer public property in the form of nominal non-monetary GIFTS to a FIRST NATION, INUIT OR MÉTIS RECIPIENT, as that term is defined in the Treasury Board’s Directive of Payments, who is involved in a collaborative ceremony, event or activity in which the Government of Canada takes part, to recognize or to honour the collaborative efforts made by that recipient’s community.
